test.name: Should Be Able To Update Measures

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://appium.io/docs/en/2.1/cli/args/ | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias | | strict_ssl | No | allows you to send commands to an invalid certificate host like a self-signed one. |

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until `text` appears on current page.

kw.name: Load Json From File
kw.doc: Load JSON from file.

kw.name: Connect To Database
kw.msg: Connect to DB using : psycopg2.connect(database='smartbit', user='postgres', password=***, host='localhost', port=5432)
kw.doc: Creates a database connection using the DB API 2.0 ``db_module`` and the parameters provided. Along with listed commonly used arguments (`db_name`, `db_host` etc.) you can set any other DB module specific parameters as key/value pairs.

kw.name: Execute Sql String
kw.msg:
Executing sql:
DELETE FROM accounts WHERE email = 'dominic.toreto@test.com';
kw.doc: Executes the ``sql_string`` as a single SQL command.

kw.name: Disconnect From Database
kw.doc: Disconnects from the database.

kw.name: Connect To Database
kw.msg: Connect to DB using : psycopg2.connect(database='smartbit', user='postgres', password=***, host='localhost', port=5432)
kw.doc: Creates a database connection using the DB API 2.0 ``db_module`` and the parameters provided. Along with listed commonly used arguments (`db_name`, `db_host` etc.) you can set any other DB module specific parameters as key/value pairs.

kw.name: Execute Sql String
kw.msg:
Executing sql:
WITH new_account AS (INSERT INTO accounts (name, email, cpf) VALUES ('Dominic Toreto', 'dominic.toreto@test.com', '13260933042') RETURNING id) INSERT INTO memberships (account_id, plan_id, credit_card, price, status) SELECT id, 2, '4242', 79.99, true FROM new_account;
kw.arg: WITH new_account AS (INSERT INTO accounts (name, email, cpf) VALUES ('${name}', '${email}', '${cpf}') RETURNING id) INSERT INTO memberships (account_id, plan_id, credit_card, price, status) SELECT id, ${plan_id}, '${card}', ${price}, true FROM new_account;
kw.doc: Executes the ``sql_string`` as a single SQL command.

kw.name: Disconnect From Database
kw.doc: Disconnects from the database.
